categories: Category:Members of the unidentified Majoor species

nodes.text: Zell was a former Republic Space Ranger who later became the ambassador of Majoor and the father of Llez.

In order to provide caretakers for his boy, Zell purchased the droids R2-D2 and C-3PO. He then left on a diplomatic mission to Armath, commanding a fleet of Majooran consular ships. When Llez was taken captive by Zell's old enemy Reddjak during this mission, Zell personally defeated the pirate, earning his son's respect.
Spelled backwards, "Zell" is "Llez", the name of his son.
